reviewText: I love Shrek. But I just realized that the one I have purchased from Amazon, is for DVD players over seas. I didn't pay close attention to the information contained in the product ad. This was my fault. Other than that, Shrek is an excellent movie!!!!
I adore Shrek.  What a fabulous way to teach children about relationships and social skills.  Plus, he is just plain fun.
Shrek and Sherk 2 are great, they are wonderful and a must for everyones DVD collection! You don't have to be a child to enjoy these DVD's!
